DataCalcInsightTemplate.builderExpression: {"version":"2.0","app":{"insightType":"CALCULATED_METRIC"},"dataNodes":{"LOAD_DATA_SOURCE0":{"id":"LOAD_DATA_SOURCE0","action":"load","parameters":{"dataset":{"label":"Asset","name":"ssot__Asset__dlm","creationType":"Standard","isExternal":false,"isExternalObjectInErrorStatus":false,"type":"dmo"},"fields":["ssot__Id__c","ssot__AssetLevelNumber__c","ssot__Name__c","ssot__AssetQuantity__c","ssot__AssetStatus__c","ssot__AvailablePercent__c","ssot__AverageUptimePerDayMinutesQuantity__c","ssot__BillToAccountId__c","ssot__CnsqncOfAssetFailure__c","ssot__CreatedById__c","ssot__CreatedDate__c","ssot__DataSourceId__c","ssot__DataSourceObjectId__c","ssot__Description__c","ssot__DigitalAssetStatus__c","ssot__DigitalAssetStatusReason__c","ssot__DowntimeSumQuantity__c","ssot__ExpectedUptimePercent__c","ssot__ExternalRecordId__c","ssot__GeocodeAccuracyType__c","ssot__InstallDateTime__c","ssot__InternalOrganizationId__c","ssot__IsCompetitorAsset__c","ssot__IsDeleted__c","ssot__isInternal__c","KQ_Id__c","KQ_LocationId__c","KQ_ParentAssetId__c","KQ_ProductId__c","KQ_RootAssetId__c","ssot__LastModifiedById__c","ssot__LastModifiedDate__c","ssot__Latitude__c","ssot__LocationId__c","ssot__Longitude__c","ssot__ManufactureDate__c","ssot__ParentAssetId__c","ssot__PriceAmount__c","ssot__PrimaryContactId__c","ssot__ProductId__c","ssot__ProductCodeText__c","ssot__ProductDescription__c","ssot__ProductFamilyName__c","ssot__PurchaseDate__c","ssot__RootAssetId__c","ssot__SerialNumber__c","ssot__ServicerAccountId__c","ssot__StockKeepingUnit__c","ssot__SupplierAccountId__c","ssot__SystemModstamp__c","ssot__TotalUsage__c","ssot__TotalUsageUnitOfMeasure__c","ssot__UniqueIdentifier__c","ssot__UnplannedDowntimeSumQuantity__c","ssot__UptimeRecordEndDateTime__c","ssot__UptimeRecordStartDateTime__c"]},"sources":[]},"LOAD_DATA_SOURCE1":{"id":"LOAD_DATA_SOURCE1","action":"load","parameters":{"dataset":{"label":"Product","name":"ssot__Product__dlm","creationType":"Standard","isExternal":false,"isExternalObjectInErrorStatus":false,"type":"dmo"},"fields":["ssot__DataSourceId__c","ssot__DataSourceObjectId__c","ssot__ExpectedLifespanNumber__c","ssot__ExpectedLifespanUOM__c","ssot__ExpectedLifetimeUsageNumber__c","ssot__ExpectedLifetimeUsageUOM__c","KQ_Id__c","ssot__ProductCode__c","ssot__Description__c","ssot__ProductFamily__c","ssot__Id__c","ssot__Name__c","ssot__ProductSKU__c"]},"sources":[]},"JOIN0":{"id":"JOIN0","action":"join","parameters":{"joinType":"inner","leftKeys":["ssot__ProductId__c","KQ_ProductId__c"],"rightQualifier":"Product","rightKeys":["ssot__Id__c","KQ_Id__c"]},"sources":["LOAD_DATA_SOURCE0","LOAD_DATA_SOURCE1"]},"TRANSFORM0":{"id":"TRANSFORM0","action":"transform","parameters":{"transforms":[{"name":"CurrentDate","label":"CurrentDate","functionName":"current_date","parameters":{}}]},"sources":["JOIN0"]},"TRANSFORM1":{"id":"TRANSFORM1","action":"transform","parameters":{"transforms":[{"name":"DaysSinceInstallVar","label":"DaysSinceInstallVar","functionName":"datediff","parameters":{"expression":{"resourceType":"field","valueType":"text","value":"CurrentDate","source":"TRANSFORM0"},"otherDate":{"resourceType":"field","valueType":"text","value":"ssot__InstallDateTime__c","source":"TRANSFORM0"}}}]},"sources":["TRANSFORM0"]},"ARITHMETIC_EXPRESSION0":{"id":"ARITHMETIC_EXPRESSION0","action":"arithmetic_expression","parameters":{"expressions":[{"name":"AssetAgeStandardized","label":"AssetAgeStandardized","expression":[{"expressionType":"group","expressionValues":[{"expressionType":"operand","resource":{"resourceType":"field","valueType":"text","value":"Product.ssot__ExpectedLifespanNumber__c","source":"TRANSFORM1"}},{"operator":"substract","expressionType":"operator"},{"expressionType":"operand","resource":{"resourceType":"field","valueType":"text","value":"DaysSinceInstallVar","source":"TRANSFORM1"}}]},{"operator":"divide","expressionType":"operator"},{"expressionType":"operand","resource":{"resourceType":"field","valueType":"text","value":"Product.ssot__ExpectedLifespanNumber__c","source":"TRANSFORM1"}},{"operator":"multiply","expressionType":"operator"},{"expressionType":"operand","resource":{"resourceType":"constant","value":100,"valueType":"number"}}]},{"name":"AgeToLifespanRatio","label":"AgeToLifespanRatio","expression":[{"expressionType":"operand","resource":{"resourceType":"field","valueType":"text","value":"DaysSinceInstallVar","source":"TRANSFORM1"}},{"operator":"divide","expressionType":"operator"},{"expressionType":"operand","resource":{"resourceType":"field","valueType":"text","value":"Product.ssot__ExpectedLifespanNumber__c","source":"TRANSFORM1"}}]}]},"sources":["TRANSFORM1"]},"CASE0":{"id":"CASE0","action":"case","parameters":{"cases":[{"name":"AssetAgeKPIVar","label":"AssetAgeKPIVar","returnValueType":"number","whenConditions":[{"expression":{"expressionType":"group","expressionValues":[{"expressionType":"condition","leftOperand":{"resourceType":"field","valueType":"text","source":"ARITHMETIC_EXPRESSION0","value":"AssetAgeStandardized"},"operator":"less_than","rightOperands":[{"resourceType":"constant","value":0,"valueType":"number"}]}]},"returnValue":{"resourceType":"constant","value":0,"valueType":"number"}},{"expression":{"expressionType":"group","expressionValues":[{"expressionType":"condition","leftOperand":{"resourceType":"field","valueType":"text","source":"ARITHMETIC_EXPRESSION0","value":"AssetAgeStandardized"},"operator":"greater_than","rightOperands":[{"resourceType":"constant","value":100,"valueType":"number"}]}]},"returnValue":{"resourceType":"constant","value":100,"valueType":"number"}}],"elseCondition":{"returnValue":{"resourceType":"field","value":"AssetAgeStandardized","valueType":"text","source":"ARITHMETIC_EXPRESSION0"}}}]},"sources":["ARITHMETIC_EXPRESSION0"]},"CASE1":{"id":"CASE1","action":"case","parameters":{"cases":[{"name":"AssetAgeSymbolVar","label":"AssetAgeSymbolVar","returnValueType":"text","whenConditions":[{"expression":{"expressionType":"group","expressionValues":[{"expressionType":"condition","leftOperand":{"resourceType":"field","valueType":"text","source":"CASE0","value":"AgeToLifespanRatio"},"operator":"greater_than","rightOperands":[{"resourceType":"constant","value":0.8,"valueType":"number"}]}]},"returnValue":{"resourceType":"constant","value":"Critical","valueType":"text"}},{"expression":{"expressionType":"group","expressionValues":[{"expressionType":"condition","leftOperand":{"resourceType":"field","valueType":"text","source":"CASE0","value":"AgeToLifespanRatio"},"operator":"less_or_equal","rightOperands":[{"resourceType":"constant","value":0.2,"valueType":"number"}]}]},"returnValue":{"resourceType":"constant","value":"Looking good","valueType":"text"}}],"elseCondition":{"returnValue":{"resourceType":"constant","value":"Warning","valueType":"text"}}}]},"sources":["CASE0"]},"AGGREGATE0":{"id":"AGGREGATE0","action":"aggregate","parameters":{"measures":[{"name":"AssetAgeKPI","label":"AssetAgeKPI","functionName":"sum","parameters":{"expression":{"resourceType":"field","valueType":"text","value":"AssetAgeKPIVar","source":"CASE1"}}}],"dimensions":[{"name":"AssetId","label":"AssetId","resource":{"resourceType":"field","valueType":"text","value":"ssot__Id__c","source":"CASE1"}},{"name":"DaysSinceInstall","label":"DaysSinceInstall","resource":{"resourceType":"field","valueType":"text","value":"DaysSinceInstallVar","source":"CASE1"}},{"name":"ExpectedLifespan","label":"ExpectedLifespan","resource":{"resourceType":"field","valueType":"text","value":"Product.ssot__ExpectedLifespanNumber__c","source":"CASE1"}},{"name":"ExpectedLifespanUnitOfMeasure","label":"ExpectedLifespanUnitOfMeasure","resource":{"resourceType":"field","valueType":"text","value":"Product.ssot__ExpectedLifespanUOM__c","source":"CASE1"}},{"name":"AssetAgeSymbol","label":"AssetAgeSymbol","resource":{"resourceType":"field","valueType":"text","value":"AssetAgeSymbolVar","source":"CASE1"}},{"name":"KeyQualifierAssetId","label":"KeyQualifierAssetId","resource":{"resourceType":"field","valueType":"text","value":"KQ_Id__c","source":"CASE1"}},{"name":"KeyQualifierProductId","label":"KeyQualifierProductId","resource":{"resourceType":"field","valueType":"text","value":"Product.KQ_Id__c","source":"CASE1"}}]},"sources":["CASE1"]}},"ui":{"nodes":{"LOAD_DATA_SOURCE0":{"label":"Asset","type":"LOAD_DATA_SOURCE","top":112,"left":112},"LOAD_DATA_SOURCE1":{"label":"Product","type":"LOAD_DATA_SOURCE","top":252,"left":112},"JOIN0":{"label":"Join","type":"JOIN","top":112,"left":252},"TRANSFORM0":{"label":"Get Current Date","type":"TRANSFORM","top":112,"left":392},"TRANSFORM1":{"label":"Calculate Days Since Install","type":"TRANSFORM","top":112,"left":532},"ARITHMETIC_EXPRESSION0":{"label":"Calculate AssetAgeStandardized & AgeToLifespanRatio","type":"ARITHMETIC_EXPRESSION","top":112,"left":672},"CASE0":{"label":"Handle Out of Range Values","type":"CASE","top":112,"left":812},"CASE1":{"label":"Map Value to Condition","type":"CASE","top":112,"left":952},"AGGREGATE0":{"label":"Specify Output","type":"AGGREGATE","top":112,"left":1092}},"connectors":[{"targetNodeId":"JOIN0","sourceNodeId":"LOAD_DATA_SOURCE0"},{"targetNodeId":"JOIN0","sourceNodeId":"LOAD_DATA_SOURCE1"},{"targetNodeId":"TRANSFORM0","sourceNodeId":"JOIN0"},{"targetNodeId":"TRANSFORM1","sourceNodeId":"TRANSFORM0"},{"targetNodeId":"ARITHMETIC_EXPRESSION0","sourceNodeId":"TRANSFORM1"},{"targetNodeId":"CASE0","sourceNodeId":"ARITHMETIC_EXPRESSION0"},{"targetNodeId":"CASE1","sourceNodeId":"CASE0"},{"targetNodeId":"AGGREGATE0","sourceNodeId":"CASE1"}]}}
DataCalcInsightTemplate.description: Determine asset age, map the value to a condition, and standardize the value into a score between 1 to 100.
DataCalcInsightTemplate.expression: SELECT SUM( CASE WHEN (( ssot__Product__dlm.ssot__ExpectedLifespanNumber__c - DATEDIFF(current_date(), ssot__Asset__dlm.ssot__InstallDateTime__c) ) / ssot__Product__dlm.ssot__ExpectedLifespanNumber__c * 100) < 0 THEN 0 WHEN (( ssot__Product__dlm.ssot__ExpectedLifespanNumber__c - DATEDIFF(current_date(), ssot__Asset__dlm.ssot__InstallDateTime__c) ) / ssot__Product__dlm.ssot__ExpectedLifespanNumber__c * 100) > 100 THEN 100 ELSE (( ssot__Product__dlm.ssot__ExpectedLifespanNumber__c - DATEDIFF(current_date(), ssot__Asset__dlm.ssot__InstallDateTime__c) ) / ssot__Product__dlm.ssot__ExpectedLifespanNumber__c * 100) END) AS assetagekpi__c, ssot__Asset__dlm.ssot__Id__c AS assetid__c, DATEDIFF(current_date(), ssot__Asset__dlm.ssot__InstallDateTime__c) AS dayssinceinstall__c, ssot__Product__dlm.ssot__ExpectedLifespanNumber__c AS expectedlifespan__c, ssot__Product__dlm.ssot__ExpectedLifespanUOM__c AS expectedlifespanunitofmeasure__c, CASE WHEN (DATEDIFF(current_date(), ssot__Asset__dlm.ssot__InstallDateTime__c) / ssot__Product__dlm.ssot__ExpectedLifespanNumber__c) > 8E-1 THEN 'Critical' WHEN (DATEDIFF(current_date(), ssot__Asset__dlm.ssot__InstallDateTime__c) / ssot__Product__dlm.ssot__ExpectedLifespanNumber__c) <= 2E-1 THEN 'Looking good' ELSE 'Warning' END AS assetagesymbol__c, ssot__Asset__dlm.KQ_Id__c AS keyqualifierassetid__c, ssot__Product__dlm.KQ_Id__c AS keyqualifierproductid__c FROM ssot__Asset__dlm JOIN ssot__Product__dlm ON (ssot__Asset__dlm.ssot__ProductId__c = ssot__Product__dlm.ssot__Id__c AND ssot__Asset__dlm.KQ_ProductId__c = ssot__Product__dlm.KQ_Id__c) GROUP BY assetid__c, dayssinceinstall__c, expectedlifespan__c, expectedlifespanunitofmeasure__c, assetagesymbol__c, keyqualifierassetid__c, keyqualifierproductid__c
